summary.content: Hello, my name is Alex and I am a dedicated Web Developer that participated in national projects (Banco Sabadell and BBVA), and also international projects (One Creation, Deutsche Bank, Zurich, Volkswagen, Audi, Seat and Skoda). I am continuously improving my skills because I have a clear goal in my mind, unleash the most upgraded version of myself into the world.

items.title: GFT Technologies SE
skills: I took part in the implementation of MiFID II in Deutsche Bank.
We used Cobol language (inside the Mainframe platform) as the main programming tool.
I have also earned experience with the language JCL (Job Control Language).
